content:
📣 All team events will be posted here.
Pings for tournaments, challenges, and giveaways.
@everyone SAFARI SIEGE 6/17/25 @ 5PM EST A wild challenge awaits. More information coming soon!

@everyone 🌿 Safari Siege (6/17/25) 🌿 The wild calls, and we answer. We are Shiny Legion — many, relentless, united in purpose. Within the shadows of the Safari, rare prey lurk, but they cannot hide from the Legion’s gaze. The Siege begins. One by one, the targets will fall. We are many. We are Legion. And the Safari will remember us. 🎯 How to Play: 🔹 Enter the Safari Zone when the Siege begins. 🔹 Hunt and catch the Pokémon that match the targets on the BINGO board. 🔹 Each time you catch a target, whisper it to the host(s) in a link. They will mark your squares. 🔹 The first hunter to complete a BINGO (5 in a row — horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) claims victory. ⚔️ Rules: ✅ Only catches made during the event period count. ✅ All catches must come from the announced Safari Zone location. ✅ You must provide proof for each entry in a whisper to the host(s). ✅ OT only — you must be the original trainer of your catches. ✅ Pokémon must remain unchanged (no evolving, breeding, or modifying). ✅ Only one character per participant may join the Siege. 🏆 Prizes: 👑 1st Place: 5×31 Jolly Alpha Shroomish (EV Trained and level 1 | Donated by @Ricxn ) — a true prize for the swiftest of the Many. ⚡ 2nd Place: 3×31 Jolly Shroomish (EV Trained and level 1) — earned by the hunter who follows close behind. The BINGO board will be posted at the start of the event. All players participating will meet at Kanto Safari Zone Ch. 2 at 5PM EST.
This is not the channel for those conversations. Please use an approprite channel.
@everyone 30 minutes until it starts! All players participating will meet at Kanto Safari Zone Ch. 2
@everyone Here is the BINGO board for the event! No caught mons before 5PM EST will be taken for an entry! https://i.imgur.com/MvJdseV.png
1st Place: @Kole 2nd Place: @FlameGamerU 3rd Place: @EmmiBlack Thank you for the turnout and participation! I hope you all had fun

@everyone Sunday August 17th, 2025 at 5pm. I will be hosting a game of Hide and Seek! Each time soneone finds me I will figure out a prize! It can be something from a pokemon to a random item. It's just for some fun and to test game knowledge! I hope to see everyone there!
